name: Smart Bus App
description: During a one-month intensive entrepreneurship program in China, my team and I created an app. It is marketed at schools, providing route planning and pickup scheduling abilities. It uses clustering/path-finding algorithms to plan optimal bus routes. Parents are able to use the app to select pickup dates, which automatically modifies the route.

name: Choose Your Own Adventure
description: Using only vanilla javascript and jQuery, I made an interactive web-based version of the classic Choose Your Own Adventure novel 'Underground Kingdom'. Features include additional animations and imagery as well as a branching path-based system that allow endless exploration.
